General.Name: Plaza Centers NV
General.Description: Plaza Centers N.V. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was involved in the establishment, operation, and sale of shopping and entertainment centers, as well as other mixed-use projects, such as retail, office, and residential projects in Central and Eastern Europe, and India. The company was formerly known as Plaza Centers (Europe) B.V. and changed its name to Plaza Centers N.V. in October 2006. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
